title: For Ghana’s Only Openly Transgender Musician, ‘Every Day Is Dangerous’
description: Maxine Angel Opoku has found a new audience for her music with songs opposing a proposed law that would make it illegal to identify as gay, transgender or queer.
dc:creator: Kwasi Gyamfi Asiedu
media:credit: Francis Kokoroko for The New York Times
media:description: The musician Maxine Angel Opoku, 37, at her home in Accra, Ghana.
